name: Street Tuning Evolution
description:
Build your dream cars, crash or repair them, fine-tune parts or race against others on the streets of speed! You may become a crazy mechanic or an outstanding racer or even both in this game.DEEP VEHICLE CUSTOMIZATION
You can strip the entire interior if you don't like it or if you want a lighter vehicle. If you like drag racing, there's an opportunity to replace the whole engine. Place decals to make a unique exterior look, buy aftermarket bodykits, wrap your car into rubber, adjust ride height, tyre pressure, camshaft angles, headlight color, horn signal... hey, that's getting complicated already!JOIN UNDERGROUND RACING COMMUNITY
Meet other racers on the streets and prove that you're not only a smart tuner, but a good racer as well.REPAIR YOUR CAR
Feel the pain of having a racing car! Repair or trash some really expensive parts after tough street racing nights.BECOME A CAR TRADER
Earn money on buying cheap and selling high. Repair or improve your cars to sell them at a better price.EXPLORE WORKSHOP
Add new cars, parts and racing tracks from workshop and the game will never end!
